OOC:  Builds BB a ship like the Vikings used and burns
it  in honor of him.  You were here a shorter time
than me, but you made me look like a complete fool
next to you (not that there are many people who
didn't).

--- black_ben14 <black_ben14@...> wrote:
> ooc:sorry guys this will be my last post.After that
> I would like rauq 
> to take me out of NBWRPG.I'm giving my chars to
> whoever wants them.
> 
> BIC:~Naga~
> 
> He checked the scanner and after a few moment he
> turns to Tyrael "Sir 
> the scanner have found 3 bases(the Decepticon dont
> seem so alive).
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure"
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael thought for a moment. Of course,
> establishing a perimeter was 
> a 
> > priority, but making certain that they were at the
> right place was 
> > more important.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Cancel your present orders. We have to
> know where we are 
> > first. Shadow Star, activate a stasis pod as soon
> as you have taken 
> a 
> > beast mode. Once you are done, come and see me.
> Naga and Talon, 
> check 
> > the long range scanners for any thermal sources
> other than 
> geological. 
> > Try to see if you detect any energy signatures.
> >

> interested by a 
> > new char, just let me know.
